languages.text: Обратил{mf|ся|ась} к арбитрам с искренней речью, призвав восстать против префекта и маршала.
Addressed the Arbitrators with an earnest speech, calling on them to rise up against the prefect and the Marshal.
languages.original_text: Обратил{mf|ся|ась} к арбитрам с искренней речью, призвав восстать против префекта и маршала.

traits.locale_text: Addressed the Arbitrators with an earnest speech, calling on them to rise up against the prefect and the Marshal.
Addressed the Arbitrators with an earnest speech, calling on them to rise up against the prefect and the Marshal.

Addressed the Arbitrators with an earnest speech, calling on them to rise up against the prefect and the Marshal.

languages.text: 你对众多法务官发表了一通言辞真挚的演说，号召他们反抗行政官与元帅。
languages.original_text: Addressed the Arbitrators with an earnest speech, calling on them to rise up against the prefect and the Marshal.

traits.locale_text: 你对众多法务官发表了一通言辞真挚的演说，号召他们反抗行政官与元帅。

languages.text: 真摯な演説でアービトレイターたちに語りかけ、総監と将帥に反抗するよう呼びかけた。
languages.original_text: Addressed the Arbitrators with an earnest speech, calling on them to rise up against the prefect and the Marshal.

traits.locale_text: 真摯な演説でアービトレイターたちに語りかけ、総監と将帥に反抗するよう呼びかけた。

languages.text: Die Arbitratoren mit einer aufrechten Ansprache dazu aufgerufen, sich gegen die Präfektin und den Marschall zu erheben.
languages.original_text: Addressed the Arbitrators with an earnest speech, calling on them to rise up against the prefect and the Marshal.

traits.locale_text: Die Arbitratoren mit einer aufrechten Ansprache dazu aufgerufen, sich gegen die Präfektin und den Marschall zu erheben.

languages.text: Hararetli bir beyanla Yargıcıları galeyana getirip prefekt ve Miralay'a karşı başkaldırmalarını istedin.
languages.original_text: Addressed the Arbitrators with an earnest speech, calling on them to rise up against the prefect and the Marshal.

traits.locale_text: Hararetli bir beyanla Yargıcıları galeyana getirip prefekt ve Miralay'a karşı başkaldırmalarını istedi.

languages.text: Te has dirigido a los Arbitrator con un discurso sincero, llamándolos a alzarse contra la prefecta y el Mariscal.
languages.original_text: Addressed the Arbitrators with an earnest speech, calling on them to rise up against the prefect and the Marshal.

traits.locale_text: Te has dirigido a los Arbitrator con un discurso sincero, llamándolos a alzarse contra la prefecta y el Mariscal.

languages.text: Vous avez adressé un discours sincère aux arbitrators pour les convaincre de se soulever contre la préfète et le maréchal.
languages.original_text: Addressed the Arbitrators with an earnest speech, calling on them to rise up against the prefect and the Marshal.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez adressé un discours sincère aux arbitrators pour les convaincre de se soulever contre la préfète et le maréchal.
